There are only about 300 drive-in theaters left in the U.S., and the shift to digital projection may eliminate most of the survivors. 

Verizon and Vodafone agree on a $130 billion deal. 

And what's behind the rising cost of shrimp.
title: PODCAST: Should we save the drive-in?
description: Verizon and Vodafone agree on a $130 billion deal. What's behind the rising cost of shrimp. And drive-ins get driven out.
